name: Suspicious LNK Double Extension File Created
description: Detects the creation of files with an "LNK" as a second extension. This is sometimes used by malware as a method to abuse the fact that Windows hides the "LNK" extension by default.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), frack113

detection.condition: selection and not 1 of filter_main_* and not 1 of filter_optional_*

falsepositives: Some tuning is required for other general purpose directories of third party apps
